channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AMD’s stock soars toward its best day in 9 years. Here’s why OpenAI wants a stake.
item.description: AMD got a big endorsement in the form of a multiyear chip deal with OpenAI, which was also issued a warrant to purchase up to 160 million AMD shares.

item.title: Social Security’s Bisignano named to additional role as CEO of IRS
item.description: The appointment would not require Senate confirmation.

item.title: ‘My monthly expenses are $6,500’: I’m 64, have $1.2 million in a 401(k) and two mortgages. Can I afford to retire?
item.description: “I want to retire next year.”

item.title: Fifth Third paying nearly $11 billion for Comerica as wave of bank mergers builds
item.description: Fifth Third said the combined company will operate in some of the fastest-growing areas of the country, such as Texas.

item.title: ‘We’re in a market bubble based on AI exuberance’: I’m moving my $200K IRA to a money-market account. Is that wise?
item.description: “I will also draw Social Security when I reach 70, which will be $3,500 per month.”
